page.title: 02MY DADS JOB
page.content: MY DAD IS A FIELD SALES MANAGER FOR A FIRM THAT SELLS LABELLING SYSTEMS.THE HEAD OFFICES ARE IN HARWICH IN ESSEX AND BOSTON IN LANCASHIRE.HE TRAVELS ALL OVER THE NORTH AND SOUTH OF ENGLAND AND HE GOES TO SCOTLAND.HE CONTROLS FROM ALL 18 SALESMEN AND 3 AREA MANAGERS WHO WORK FOR HIM.HIS COMPANY SELL THEIR ALL BRITISH PRODUCTS INTO BOTH THE RETAIL AND INDUSTRIAL MARKETS.FOR AN EXAMPLE;EVEREYTHING FROM PRICE MARKETING EQUIPMENT TO GENERAL LABELLING TO AUTOMATIC IN-LINE SYSTEMS. THEY EVEN SUPPLY A SPECIALISED SYSTEM FOR USE IN SCHOOLS .IT IS CALLED "SCHOOL PACK".IT HAS PIECES OF COLOURED STICKY PAPER IN IT.
